title: NDA -- access to meta-data
body:
ATM access to meta-data associated with data provided from S3
- miNDAR package needs to be generated
- per package credentials specified
  So, even having NDAR credentials sufficient to access the meta-data, it is impossible to access it without going through miNDAR

@obenshaindw is the NDAR guru who might work to provide a service to access meta-data associated with GUIDs/datasets etc, so it might come out in the future.

For now, within #527 we will just (ultimately) provide a super-dataset with access to Image datasets from NDAR without associated meta-data being provided (although possibly accessed initially to create the datasets via miNDAR package)

References:
- https://github.com/BANDA-connect/NDA-sprint/wiki/NDA-Entity-Relationship-Diagrams

Notes
- 1-to-many Collection -> Submission -> Dataset  .
-  "res-subsmissions" result in previous submission being archived (not accessible unless referenced by some other collection(?)), new submission is created to replace previous one (in a collection(?))
